pages.text: Temperature is a crucial factor to surviving mother nature and her wraith, as unbalances in your body temp can become fatal.$(br2)For this exact reason, managing your temperature in cold AND warm environments is crucial. Let's take a look at managing your body temp.

pages.title: Cold Weather
pages.text: Cold weather is a tough natural occurence to get through and will surely make you wanting for warmth again. To counter this, some methods can be used such as a campfire, lava or specific clothing. To get this right, we need to make clothing to fit the cold weather.$(br2)See following pages for crafitng recipes on cold clothing.
Wolf Pelts can be collected by slaying Wolves found in the Wilderness.
